text.en: How are you feeling right now — are you feeling **good**, or **not okay**?
text.tl: Kumusta ang pakiramdam mo ngayon — **masaya** ka ba, o **hindi okay**?

text.en: I’m glad to hear that. What made you feel better — do you want to **talk about it**, or **chat about food**?
text.tl: Masaya akong marinig yan. Ano ang nakapagpagaan ng pakiramdam mo — gusto mo bang **magkwento**, o **pagkain** ang pag-usapan natin?

text.en: That sounds heavy. What would help right now — do you want to **talk about it**, or **think about food**?
text.tl: Mukhang mabigat yan. Ano ang makakatulong ngayon — gusto mo bang **magkwento**, o **pagkain** muna ang isipin?

text.en: I’m listening. Do you feel **better now**, or are you still **feeling heavy**?
text.tl: Nakikinig ako. **Magaan na ba** ang pakiramdam mo, o **mabigat pa rin**?

text.en: Are you actually **hungry**, or just **craving** something?
text.tl: Talagang **gutom** ka ba, o **craving** ka lang?

text.en: Which meal are you thinking about — **breakfast**, or **lunch or dinner**?
text.tl: Anong meal ang naiisip mo — **almusal**, o **tanghalian o hapunan**?
Ano ang hinahanap ng panlasa mo — **matamis**, o **maalat**?

text.en: Sounds good. Do you want to **eat now**, or **go back to chatting**?
text.tl: Mukhang masarap yan. Gusto mo bang **kumain na**, o **magkwento pa**?

text.en: Enjoy your food. When you’re ready, do you want to **check in again**, or **say goodbye for now**?
text.tl: Sige, kain ka muna. Kapag ready ka na, gusto mo bang **kumusta ulit**, o **magpaalam muna**?
